body.head: NNA019492
body.p: Then he went search in of food. He found Crabapple-Owner. Crabapple-Owner was climbing about. Then he became a child again. "Wuāʼ, wuāʼ, wuāʼ!" said Greedy-One. Then the woman saw the child. "Ā, ā, ā, ā!" said the woman to the child, for he had again become a child, although he had been full grown. Then he entered the house of the woman, Crabapple-Woman. She had Greedy-One for her child. Then he ate the food of the woman, and he ate it all.
